situation.title: Gatherings
situation.meta_description: Rules for organizing demonstrations, restrictions on the number of people and hygiene measures.

content.processed:
Rules and Recommendations

The government's measures restricted the right to peaceful assembly. If you want to go or organize a demonstration, there must not be more than 100 of you, you must be in groups of a maximum of 20 participants and you must keep the spacing between groups at least 2 meters. All participants at the demonstration must wear a face mask or other respiratory protection. Demonstrations must also take place outdoors (i.e. not indoors, such as halls, cultural centers, etc.).
